chargeHist.descr: Sex with Child Age 16 or Older

result.execSummary:
The defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex with Child Age 16 or Older, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.09.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

supervisions.notes: If revoked, defendant may have release for work.

miscConds.notes:
No contact with the victim.
No unsupervised contact with children under the age of 16 years with the exception of the following minors:
- Y. C-F. dob 4/04/11
- A. C-F. dob 12/30/12
- D. C-F. dob 12/16/14
- J.C. dob 12/11/02
- C.C. dob 11/26/05
- B.C. 8/16/12

Obtain sex offender evaluation. Court finds the sex offender evaluation completed by the defendant during the pendancy of this case satisfies this requirement;
Attend at least six (6) counseling sessions focused on healthy relationships and appropriate behavior on social media sites;

charges.descr: Sex with Child Age 16 or Older

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Efrain Lopez-Mendez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Sentencing document submitted by attorney Schiro received and filed. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.
Victim Impact Statements with attached statement translation received and filed. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.

Defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp on behalf of Erin Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for sentencing hearing. Defense counsel WAIVED the use of an interpreter for purposes of this hearing. ADA Karshen is in trial in Branch 15 and is unable to appear in court today. Defense does not object to an adjournment. Court ordered this matter adjourned. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court retained this matter post-rotation. Case transferred back to Branch 25. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.

Defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for plea hearing. Sworn as Interpreter: Brenda Bartholomew. Parties have reached a resolution in this matter. State placed negotiations on the record. On motion of the State, Court amended the criminal complaint to reflect the offense date of between 9/19/14 and 11/20/14. The charge in count 1 remains the same. 
Defendant sworn in.

As to COUNT 1 as AMENDED-
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum, and Jury Instructions received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty.  Judgment of conviction entered.

Branch 25 will retain this case post-rotation. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 12, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Sentencing Memorandum with attachments submitted by attorney Schiro received and filed. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.

Defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea hearing.  For reasons stated on the record, the Court granted the Defense request for an adjournment. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez in court with attorney George David Kidd.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for plea hearing. Sworn as Interpreter: Brenda Bartholomew. Defense counsel is in the process of having a private evaluation completed and requests an adjourned plea date. Court granted defense request. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez in court with attorney John Scott Schiro.  Erin M. Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for Scheduling Conference. Case heard off the record. Interpreter not utilized for this hearing. Defense requests a Plea hearing.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed. Case adjourned to branch 25.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADA Karshen contacted the court requesting a short adjournment of the scheduling conference. Defense counsel does not object. Court rescheduled this matter to 3/12/15 at 1:30 p.m. for Scheduling Conference in Branch 25. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.
Copy of letter to ADA Karshen from attorney Schiro received and filed. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.
Notice of Retainer with attached cover letter received and filed. Deputy Court Clerk ccp.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MP (12/31/97) OR HER HOME, OR WORK (MCDONALD'S).
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez in court with attorney Kathleen Judith Osvat.  Defendant Efrain Lopez-Mendez in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge ROTHSTEIN.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel.  Defendant entered a plea of not guilty.  DEFENDANT DOES  NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER  REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for SCHEDULING in Branch 25.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
